about_the_job:
Lead a cancer treatment center, and become the primary physician.|Chance to work together with hemato-oncology experts, with >50 years experience


About Our Client

Multinational cancer treatment center, with a value to make cancer treatment seamless and pleasant - and help the patients more comfortably go through these difficult times. They desire to help Indonesian patients in getting treatment from the expert, while accommodating the treatment in a homey environment, surrounded by local experts. In achieving this mission, they are looking for Internal Medicine Specialist (Spesialis Penyakit Dalam) to help with the treatment process.

Job Description

Provide treatment and monitoring to cancer patients, within close collaboration with the Hematology & Oncology expert in the Headquarters
Become the face of the clinic, and represent clinic in major clinical events
Oversee the business practice of the clinic
Work closely with Hematology & Oncology expert in the Headquarters to review cases and discuss treatment plan
Be a strategic partner to build & maintain relationships with key stakeholders.
The Successful Applicant

Internal Medicine Specialist (dokter Spesialis Penyakit Dalam) graduated from reputable university
Minimum 2 years experience in medical practice as internal medicine specialist
Working experience with high-end treatment center and/or medical tourism clinic is strongly preferred
Deep passion for oncology & hematology sub-specialization
Having effective and articulate communication skill
Good team player - with ability to lead a team
Fluency in English and Bahasa is a must, Chinese proficiency is preferred
What's on Offer
Opportunity to work with hematology & oncology experts, with >50 years of experience
International trainings & professional elaboration chance
Privilege to be the face of clinic, and networking chance with important healthcare stakeholders
